definition: Eastern or later Han dynasty, 25-220
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
surname Dong
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
man

sentences.english: Legend has it that there was a devil in Dynasty of Dong Han.
sentences.chinese: 相傳，在東漢時期有一妖怪爲禍人間。

sentences.english: The Emperor Mingdi of the Eastern Han Dynasty dreamt of a golden man flying over the palace.
sentences.chinese: 東漢明帝夢見一個金人飛行於宮殿之上。

sentences.english: The first lion was presented to China during the Eastern Han Dynasty by a king from the Western Regions.
sentences.chinese: 東漢時，西域安息國王向中國獻上了第一頭獅子。

sentences.english: The formation of the Eastern Han Dynasty confucian classics family depended on the political and cultural aspects.
sentences.chinese: 東漢經學世家的形成取決於政治和文化兩個方面。

sentences.english: The Han Dynasty administered Guangdong, Guangxi, and northern Vietnam as Jiao Province.
sentences.chinese: 東漢在此設立交州，管轄兩廣及越南北部地區。

sentences.english: Han Guangwu, the directors declared that Luoyang is a typical one.
sentences.chinese: 東漢光武帝時，洛陽令董宣便是其中典型的一員。

sentences.english: Mature celadon was achieved in the first century A. D. (Eastern Han dynasty).
sentences.chinese: 成熟青瓷約在公元一世紀的東漢時期燒造成功。

sentences.english: Han dynasty, so called ci card, say again MingCi.
sentences.chinese: 東漢時稱爲刺，故名片又稱名刺。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the upright officials' achievements in politics and culture are the main focus of attention in the Eastern Han history.
sentences.chinese: “江南”循吏的政治文化表現，更是東漢史的亮點。

sentences.english: There are pictures of women playing football at the time of the Eastern Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 在東漢時期就有婦女踢足球的圖片記載。

sentences.english: The Chinese translation of Buddhist scriptures went through the important times during the c. 700-year period from the Eastern Han Dynasty to the middle Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 自東漢至中唐約七百年之間，爲佛典漢譯的重要時期。

sentences.english: A combination of the two became the general trend in the academic world since the Eastern Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 儒道兼綜是東漢以來學術發展的基本趨向。

sentences.english: In the East Han Dynasty Hebei linen fabric textile had also developed in a big way.
sentences.chinese: 東漢時，河北的麻織業也有了較大發展。

sentences.english: At the time of Eastern Han Dynasty, Chijie(to hold the imperial insignia and serve as a diplomatic envoy) was a very important system in the rule of the government.
sentences.chinese: 東漢時期，國家使官員持節是實行統治的重要方式。

sentences.english: When to Eastern Han Dynasty, the hollow brick reduces suddenly, results in vanishes.
sentences.chinese: 東漢時，空心磚驟然減少，終至絕跡。

sentences.english: One year in the Eastern Han Dynasty, there was a serious famine in Henan.
sentences.chinese: 東漢時的某一年，河南一帶，饑荒嚴重。

definition: Western Han Dynasty (206 BC-8 AD), also called 前漢|前汉[Qian2 Han4], Former Han Dynasty
the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
Eastern Jin dynasty 317-420
the Warring States period (475-221 BC)
History of the Former Han Dynasty, second of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed by Ban Gu 班固[Ban1 Gu4] in 82 during Eastern Han (later Han), 100 scrolls
Han Dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
Emperor Wu of the Han dynasty (141-87 BC)
Wei (220-265) and Jin (265-420) dynasties
to write down/to record/written account
Records of the Grand Historian, by 司馬遷|司马迁[Si1 ma3 Qian1], first of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3]
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods
Sima Qian (145-86 BC), Han Dynasty historian, author of Records of the Grand Historian 史記|史记[Shi3 ji4], known as the father of Chinese historiography
surname Jin/the Jin Dynasties (265-420)/Western Jin 西晉|西晋[Xi1 Jin4] (265-316), Eastern Jin 東晉|东晋[Dong1 Jin4] (317-420) and Later Jin Dynasty (936-946)/short name for Shanxi province 山西[Shan1 xi1]
to move forward/to promote/to advance
Three Kingdoms period (220-280) in Chinese history/several Three Kingdoms periods in Korean history, esp. from 1st century AD to unification under Silla 新羅|新罗[Xin1 luo2] in 658
inscribed stone tablet placed in the tomb/memorial inscription on such a tablet
the Rites of Zhou (in Confucianism)
